sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import '../css/reporttable.css'; import { createAPIEndpoint, ENDPOINTS } from '../api/index.js'; function EmployeeSearch(){ const [data, setData] = useState([]); const blankFilters = { id: "", fname: "", lname: "", byear: "", bmonth: "", bday: "", superid: "", title: "", username: "" }; const [filters,setFilters] = useState(blankFilters); const updateFilters = (obj) => {setFilters({...filters,...obj});}; function findemployee() { createAPIEndpoint(ENDPOINTS.employee) .fetch() .then(response => { setData(response.data)}) .catch(error => console.log(error))} const renderTable = () => { let info = data; return info.map(elem =>{ return( {elem.employee_id} {elem.fname} {elem.lname} {new Date(elem.dob).toLocaleDateString()} {elem.supervisor_id} {elem.job_title} {elem.username} {elem.password} ) })} return (

Employee Search

*You can search by exact matches or by ranges for birthdates. Only search by one or the other.

Employee ID: Supervisor ID: Job Title:
updateFilters({id:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({superid:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({title:e.target.value})}/>
First Name: Last Name: Username:
updateFilters({fname:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({lname:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({username:e.target.value})}/>
Birth Year: Least Birth Year: Greatest Birth Year:
updateFilters({byear:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({minbyear:e.target.value,byear:""})}/> updateFilters({maxbyear:e.target.value,byear:""})}/>
Birth Month: Least Birth Month: Greatest Birth Month:
updateFilters({bmonth:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({minbmonth:e.target.value,bmonth:""})}/> updateFilters({maxbmonth:e.target.value,bmonth:""})}/>
Birth Day: Least Birth Day: Greatest Birth Day:
updateFilters({bday:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({minbday:e.target.value,bday:""})}/> updateFilters({maxbday:e.target.value,bday:""})}/>





{renderTable()}
Employee ID First Name Last Name Date of Birth Supervisor ID Job Title Username Password
); } export default EmployeeSearch;
